items.title: Ukraine denies drone attack on Putin's residence
items.description: Russia has accused Ukraine of targeting a presidential residence, which President Zelensky called "typical Russian lies".

items.title: French right pushes for national tribute to film star Brigitte Bardot
items.description: A petition for a national homage to Brigitte Bardot - who died on Sunday - attracts more than 23,000 signatures.

items.title: Turkey detains 357 suspected IS members in nationwide raids
items.description: The arrests come just a day after three police officers were killed during a siege in the town of Yalova.

items.title: K-pop band NewJeans breaks up after bitter feud with record label
items.description: Ador says it has dropped NewJeans member Danielle Marsh while the return of Minji remains uncertain.

items.title: Why Israel's recognition of Somaliland as an independent state is controversial
items.description: Somaliland wants international recognition - here's why, and what could have driven Israel to recognise it now.
